title: Tomonori Hirayama
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Hirayama was born in <a href="Hamamatsu">Hamamatsu</a> on January 9, 1978. After graduating from high school, he joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Kashiwa%20Reysol">Kashiwa Reysol</a> with teammate <a href="Toru%20Irie">Toru Irie</a> in 1996. Although he was left side midfielder, he could hardly play in the match behind <a href="Tomohiro%20Katanosaka">Tomohiro Katanosaka</a> until early 1999. In August 1999, he became a regular player and the club won the champions <a href="1999%20J.League%20Cup">1999 J.League Cup</a>. The club also won the 3rd place <a href="1999%20J.League%20Division%201">1999</a> and <a href="2000%20J.League%20Division%201">2000 J1 League</a>. From 2004, although his opportunity to play decreased, he played many matches as substitute. However the club results were bad and was relegated to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> from 2006. In 2006, he played many matches as starting member and the club was promoted to J1 in a year. However he could hardly play in the match in 2007 and retired end of 2007 season.
